params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the row `div`.

params.name: key.text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the each key. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: key.html
params.description: Text or HTML to use within the each key.

params.name: key.classes
params.description: Classes to add to the key wrapper.

params.name: value.text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the each value. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: value.html
params.description: Text or HTML to use within the each value.

params.name: value.classes
params.description: Classes to add to the value wrapper.

params.name: actions.classes
params.description: Classes to add to the actions wrapper.

params.name: href
params.description: The value of the link href attribute for an action item.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each action item. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: Text or HTML to use within the each action item.

params.name: visuallyHiddenText
params.description: Actions rely on context from the surrounding content so may require additional accessible text, text supplied to this option is appended to the end, use `html` for more complicated scenarios.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the action item.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the action item.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the container.
